mapper.select: SELECT (case when DEPT_NAME='磨浮设备' THEN '设备' WHEN DEPT_NAME='磨浮生产' THEN '生产' WHEN DEPT_NAME='电仪工段' THEN '电仪' END )section, count(COMPLETESTATE = 'Y' OR NULL) AS checked, count(COMPLETESTATE = 'W' OR NULL) AS unchecked, count(ALTPID = 1 OR NULL) AS alarm, count(ALTPID = 2 OR NULL) AS danger FROM dxj_spot_result WHERE (ROUTE_NAME='浮选系统' OR ROUTE_NAME='浮选路线') AND ( devName = "${equip}" OR devName = CONCAT("${equip}","电机") ) AND to_days(TASKSTART_TM) = to_days(now()) -- 当天数据 -- TASKSTART_TM>'2019-07-10' GROUP BY section

select '设备' as 'devName', MAX(CASE WHEN ( SC_PART='轴承（上）' and SC_CONTENT='温度') THEN tempResult end ) as 'a1', MAX(CASE WHEN ( SC_PART='轴承（上）' and SC_CONTENT='润滑是否良好') THEN tempResult end ) as 'a2', MAX(CASE WHEN ( SC_PART='轴承（下）' and SC_CONTENT='温度' ) THEN tempResult end ) as 'a3', MAX(CASE WHEN ( SC_PART='轴承（下）' and SC_CONTENT='润滑是否良好' ) THEN tempResult end ) as 'a4', MAX(CASE WHEN SC_PART='主轴' THEN tempResult end ) as 'a5', MAX(CASE WHEN SC_PART='叶轮' THEN tempResult end ) as 'a6', MAX(CASE WHEN ( SC_PART='皮带' ) THEN tempResult end ) as 'a7', MAX(CASE WHEN ( SC_PART='稳流桶' ) THEN tempResult end ) as 'a8', MAX(CASE WHEN ( SC_PART='其它' ) THEN tempResult end ) as 'a9'
FROM ( SELECT SC_PART,devName,SC_CONTENT,RESULT, (CASE WHEN RESULT='停机不检' THEN RESULT WHEN RESULT='手工已检' THEN REMARK WHEN ((SC_CONTENT!='温度') AND (ALTPID = 2 OR ALTPID=1) ) THEN '故障' WHEN ((SC_CONTENT!='温度') AND (ALTPID = 0)) THEN '正常' ELSE RESULT END ) as tempResult FROM dxj_spot_result WHERE DEPT_NAME='磨浮设备' AND ROUTE_NAME='浮选系统' AND devName = "${equip}" -- AND TASKSTART_TM='2019-06-24' AND to_days(TASKSTART_TM) = to_days(now())-- 当天数据 )as temp

select '生产' as 'devName',
MAX(CASE WHEN SC_PART='矿浆pH值' THEN tempResult end ) as 'a1',
MAX(CASE WHEN SC_PART='矿浆浓度' THEN tempResult end ) as 'a2',
MAX(CASE WHEN SC_PART='矿浆细度' THEN tempResult end ) as 'a3'
MAX(CASE WHEN SC_PART='矿浆pH值' THEN tempResult end ) as 'a1', MAX(CASE WHEN SC_PART='矿浆浓度' THEN tempResult end ) as 'a2'
FROM ( SELECT SC_PART,devName,SC_CONTENT,RESULT, (CASE WHEN RESULT='停机不检' THEN RESULT WHEN RESULT='手工已检' THEN REMARK WHEN ( (ALTPID = 2 OR ALTPID=1) ) THEN '故障' WHEN ( ALTPID = 0) THEN '正常' ELSE RESULT END ) as tempResult FROM dxj_spot_result WHERE DEPT_NAME='磨浮生产' AND ROUTE_NAME='浮选路线' AND devName = "${equip}" -- AND TASKSTART_TM='2019-08-19' AND to_days(TASKSTART_TM) = to_days(now())-- 当天数据 )as temp

select '电仪' as 'devName', MAX(CASE WHEN SC_CONTENT='测振' THEN tempResult end ) as 'a1', MAX(CASE WHEN SC_CONTENT='测温' THEN tempResult end ) as 'a2', MAX(CASE WHEN SC_CONTENT='有无异响' THEN tempResult end ) as 'a3', MAX(CASE WHEN SC_CONTENT='有无松动' THEN tempResult end ) as 'a4' FROM ( SELECT SC_PART,devName,SC_CONTENT,RESULT, (CASE WHEN RESULT='停机不检' THEN RESULT WHEN RESULT='手工已检' THEN REMARK WHEN ( (ALTPID = 2 OR ALTPID=1) ) THEN '故障' WHEN ( ALTPID = 0) THEN '正常' ELSE RESULT END ) as tempResult FROM dxj_spot_result WHERE DEPT_NAME='电仪工段' AND ROUTE_NAME='浮选系统' AND devName = CONCAT("${equip}","电机") -- AND TASKSTART_TM='2019-08-19' AND to_days(TASKSTART_TM) = to_days(now())-- 当天数据 )as temp
